name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attribuly link shortener for Shopify store

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create short links with one click. Track performance from click to purchase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create short links for your Shopify store with one click. Track the buying journey from click to purchase. Track all campaigns across channels. 

-What is Attribuly?
Attribuly is a leading marketing analytics that powers tracking, and attribution for Shopify merchants and other e-commerce platforms, trusted by 10,000 brands like Jackery. A must have for e-commerce marketers. 
 
- Attribuly features:
☝️ Free short links but track more conversions metrics than Bitly.
👌 Support your brand domain.
☝️ Track the whole buying journey from clicks to purchase, powered by our 365-day first-party cookie. It's not blocked by browsers or ad blockers. 
✌️ Measure every campaign's ROI, including ads, influencer, affiliate(ShareAsale, UpPromote, Impact, Awin), Email(Klaviyo, MailChimp, Omnisend), and more! 
🖖 Get 11% higher conversion rate with Facebook, Google, TikTok CAPI, Google Analytics 4 integration, ads automation.
✅ Centralized dashboard, get customer journey, LTV, profit, margin, blended ROAS.

- Most Popular of Attribuly
✅  Multi Touch Attribution for your conversions to all the e-commerce channels, with complete metrics to optimize your ROAS. 
✅  Get every order's complete buying journey, minimize "direct traffic". 
✅  Build server-side tracking for a cookieless world. 

💻How to use:
🔸 Create short links. 
🔸 Connect your Shopify store(WooCommerce, Shopline, Shoplazza, Magento are also supported with a custom installation). 
🔸 View the performance including clicks, users, add to cart, purchase. 

- Notes
💎The link shortener can also be used by other attribution tools such as TripleWhale, Hyros, Polar Analytics,  Northbeam, SegMetrics.
💎Attribuly offers ads automation, segmentation audience post back. 

- 📪Contact us via email: support@attribuly.com
- Website: www.attribuly.com
